title: Updating Cody search indexâ€¦ hangs forever
answer: I have been on this for two weeks. Now, I believe it is not directly related to Cody. I had Python Extension deactivated, and activating it fixed the problem.

title: Claude 3.7 Sonnet does not show in model list ES plan
answer: All models available on Pro will be rollout out gradually to Enterprise Starters. The team is already aware of it and working on it.

title: Keep getting error: This file has been restricted by an admin. Autocomplete, commands, and other Cody features are disabled
answer: I was able to get it working by downgrading to Pycharm version - 2024.2.5. Previously I had the latest - 2024.3.2.

title: Security Question
answer: As far as I know then if you are using your own API key and model configuration with cody.dev.models then request is directly made to your provider. Of course, maybe some additional processing may happen in the background to fetch the context and send some telemetry data but overall the processed promopt/request should be sent to your deployment directly.

title: Cody plugin not working with GoLand EAP
answer: JB released an update to the GoLand EAP. The 7.12.1 nightly build plugin seems to work with Build #GO-251.17181.28, built on January 23, 2025.

title: VScode extension not working in SSH remote connection
answer: I patched the package.json of sourcegraph.sourcegraph and set "extensionKind": [ "ui" ], and then reinstalled the extension. When I now establish a remote connection, Sourcegraph code search works fine with the local settings also in the remote workspace.

title: Hitting Limits Due to Model Switching
answer: My ban was overturned. It appears that was related to 'problematic code'. Please update your plugin/extension to the latest stable version of Cody and then try logging in and out again.
